caption.title: References and scoring results of literature survey
caption.p: Literature search on Web of Science (accessed August 30, 2018) with the following search query: (host-parasite* OR host-pathogen*) AND (genomic*). We refined the search hits by document type to include only articles, covering the publication years 2014â€“2018, and excluding studies with no genomic aspect. The table contains 263 papers with scores for each scale defined in Table 2.
Click here for additional data file.
